name: The Harvest Inspector
description:
"Good morning, Inspector. At 2300 hours last night, cargo vessel LD-52 arrived in orbit of Mudul IV. We believe that one of the consignments has been poisoned."

A fragile peace has mere minutes to live. It falls to you to uncover the truth: which consignment was poisoned, who is responsible, and who are they targeting?

The Harvest Inspector was made for the Ludum Dare 52 Compo.
(The Linux build might be haunted.)
